trans-unit.source: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

seg-source.mrk: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

target.mrk: Installer <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

trans-unit.source: If you cannot install in graphical mode, you have the option to install/upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode.

seg-source.mrk: If you cannot install in graphical mode, you have the option to install/upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode.

target.mrk: Si vous ne pouvez pas utiliser l’installation en mode graphique, il vous est possible d’installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux.

trans-unit.source: To do so, you must create a batch file. Then you can use this file to install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on machines without graphical or X terminals.

seg-source.mrk: To do so, you must create a batch file.
Then you can use this file to install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on machines without graphical or X terminals.

target.mrk: Pour ce faire, vous devez créer un fichier batch.

Puis l’utiliser pour effectuer l’installation du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur des machines sans terminal graphique ou terminal X.

trans-unit.source: To Install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

seg-source.mrk: To Install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

target.mrk: Pour installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

alt-trans.seg-source: To install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
To uninstall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
To upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
alt-trans.target: Mettre à jour <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

trans-unit.source: To edit the file, use a bare metal text editor, such as Notepad, not a Word Processor such as MS-Word. Use double backslashes in Windows.

seg-source.mrk: To edit the file, use a bare metal text editor, such as Notepad, not a Word Processor such as MS-Word.
Use double backslashes in Windows.

target.mrk: Utilisez un éditeur de texte, tel que Notepad, pour modifier le fichier, et non pas un traitement de texte tel que MS-Word.
Vous devez utiliser des antislashs doubles pour les chemins Windows.

alt-trans.seg-source: Use double backslashes in Windows paths.
alt-trans.target: Pour les chemins Windows, utilisez des antislashs doubles.

alt-trans.seg-source: Use double backslashes in Windows paths.
alt-trans.target: Pour les chemins Windows, utilisez des antislashs doubles.

trans-unit.source: Open the batch_install_sample.txt sample file located in the Setup directory of the product iso.

seg-source.mrk: Open the batch_install_sample.txt sample file located in the Setup directory of the product iso.

target.mrk: Ouvrez le fichier batch_install_sample.txt qui se trouve dans le répertoire Setup du téléchargement du produit.

trans-unit.source: Set the value of the required parameters according to your environment and save the batch file as a text file. This sample file gives you the opportunity to install and upgrade different products in silent mode, including the License Manager. This sample is set to install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. If you plan to install a <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, you also must uncomment and set these variables:

seg-source.mrk: Set the value of the required parameters according to your environment and save the batch file as a text file.
This sample file gives you the opportunity to install and upgrade different products in silent mode, including the License Manager.
This sample is set to install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
If you plan to install a <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, you also must uncomment and set these variables:

target.mrk: Choisissez la valeur des paramètres obligatoires en fonction de votre environnement et enregistrez le fichier en tant qu’un fichier texte.
Ce fichier permet d’installer ou de mettre à jour plusieurs produits en mode silencieux, y compris le License Manager.
Cet exemple permet d’installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Si vous prévoyez d'installer un serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, vous devez également décommenter et définir ces variables:

seg-source.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_HSX

target.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_HSX

seg-source.mrk: ALN_HTTP_PORT

target.mrk: ALN_HTTP_PORT

seg-source.mrk: ALN_HTTPS_PORT

target.mrk: ALN_HTTPS_PORT

trans-unit.source: Launch the installer using this command:

seg-source.mrk: Launch the installer using this command:

target.mrk: Lancez l’installation à l’aide de la commande suivante :

seg-source.mrk: -f

target.mrk: -f

seg-source.mrk: Examples:

target.mrk: Exemples :

seg-source.mrk: Windows.

target.mrk: Windows.

seg-source.mrk: C:\temp\ATS340-Windows-X64.exe -f C:\temp\my_batch_file.txt

target.mrk: C:\temp\ATS340-Windows-X64.exe -f C:\temp\my_batch_file.txt

seg-source.mrk: Linux.

target.mrk: Linux.

seg-source.mrk: /tmp/ATS340-Linux-X64.bin -f /tmp/my_batch_file.txt

target.mrk: /tmp/ATS340-Linux-X64.bin -f /tmp/my_batch_file.txt

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installation starts automatically with the parameters specified in your batch file.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installation starts automatically with the parameters specified in your batch file.

target.mrk: L’installation du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> démarre avec les paramètres spécifiés dans votre fichier batch.

trans-unit.source: To Upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

seg-source.mrk: To Upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

target.mrk: Pour mettre à jour le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

alt-trans.seg-source: To upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
alt-trans.target: Mettre à jour <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

alt-trans.seg-source: To install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
To uninstall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode

trans-unit.source: The procedure to upgrade is the same as to install. However, some parameters must be modified to perform a silent upgrade:

seg-source.mrk: The procedure to upgrade is the same as to install.
However, some parameters must be modified to perform a silent upgrade:

target.mrk: La procédure de mise à jour est identique à la procédure d’installation.
Cependant, vous devez modifier certains paramètres afin d’effectuer une mise à jour en mode silencieux :

seg-source.mrk: Set INSTALL_MODE_IS_UPGRADE=1.

target.mrk: Positionnez INSTALL_MODE_IS_UPGRADE=1.

trans-unit.source: Set HSS_ENV_NAME to the name of the environment you plan to upgrade.

seg-source.mrk: Set HSS_ENV_NAME to the name of the environment you plan to upgrade.

target.mrk: La valeur de HSS_ENV_NAME doit être le nom de l’environnement à mettre à jour.

seg-source.mrk: Comment out these lines:

target.mrk: Mettez en commentaire les lignes suivantes :

seg-source.mrk: HYPERSTREAM_NAME=default

target.mrk: HYPERSTREAM_NAME=default

seg-source.mrk: HYPERSTREAM_PORT=23232

target.mrk: HYPERSTREAM_PORT=23232

seg-source.mrk: ADE_WEB_CONSOLE_PORT=8181 (default value)

target.mrk: ADE_WEB_CONSOLE_PORT=8181 (default value)

seg-source.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_BASE=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

target.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_BASE=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

seg-source.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_BLOCKS=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

target.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_BLOCKS=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

seg-source.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_STREAMS=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

target.mrk: USER_INSTALL_DIR_STREAMS=/usr/Atempo/HyperStream/default

trans-unit.source: To Uninstall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

seg-source.mrk: To Uninstall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Silent Mode

target.mrk: Pour désinstaller le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

alt-trans.seg-source: To uninstall <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
To install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
To upgrade <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode
alt-trans.target: Mettre à jour <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

trans-unit.source: If you installed the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server in silent mode, the uninstallation automatically runs in silent mode too. See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Uninstallation.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Uninstalling [%=HSS.hys_exe%]</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: If you installed the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server in silent mode, the uninstallation automatically runs in silent mode too.
See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Uninstallation.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Uninstalling [%=HSS.hys_exe%]</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Si vous avez installé le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux, la désinstallation se lance automatiquement en mode silencieux.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Uninstallation.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Uninstalling [%=HSS.hys_exe%]</MadCap:xref>.

alt-trans.seg-source: If you installed the server in silent mode, the uninstallation automatically runs in silent mode too.
alt-trans.target: Si vous avez installé le serveur en mode silencieux, la désinstallation s'exécute automatiquement en mode silencieux aussi.

alt-trans.seg-source: If you installed the server in silent mode, the uninstallation automatically runs in silent mode too.
alt-trans.target: Si vous avez installé le serveur en mode silencieux, la désinstallation s'exécute automatiquement en mode silencieux aussi.
